sentences.sentence: The two men are playing a game of political one-upmanship.
sentences.translation: 这两个男人在玩一场谁更高人一等的政治游戏。

sentences.sentence: there might seem little room left for one-upmanship beyond fitting yet more gold-plated taps and a mini-submarine berth.
sentences.translation: 不是“预留一个小舱室，为了以后安装更多镀金水龙头和微型潜艇泊位，好胜人一筹”
